greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A160410.
comment: The rows of the triangle in A147582 converge to this sequence.
Contribution from Omar E. Pol, Mar 28 2011 (Start):
a(n) is the number of cells turned "ON" at n-th stage of the cellular automaton of A160410.
a(n) is also the number of toothpicks added at n-th stage to the toothpick structure of A160410.
link: David Applegate, Omar E. Pol and N. J. A. Sloane, The Toothpick Sequence and Other Sequences from Cellular Automata, Congressus Numerantium, Vol. 206 (2010), 157-191. [There is a typo in Theorem 6: (13) should read u(n) = 4.3^(wt(n-1)-1) for n >= 2.]
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
Omar E. Pol, Illustration of initial terms (Neighbors of the vertices) [From _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 17 2009]
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, May 20 2009, Jun 13 2009, Jun 14 2009
ext: Edited by _David Applegate_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 13 2009
